about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS CONTENT


Board the China Railways CR400BF ‘Golden Phoenix’ from Just Trains for an exhilarating run along South West China High Speed.

The CR400BF is one of the world’s fastest conventional high-speed trains in service today, with a cruising speed of 350 km/h (217 mph) and a top speed of 400 km/h (249 mph). Development of this high-speed locomotive started in 2012, with a goal of creating a new China Standardised EMU for China’s high-speed network.

The final design came in 2014, followed by the first production unit in June 2015. Successful tests on Datong–Xi'an Passenger Railway in November 2015 saw the new locomotive hit speeds of 385 km/h (239 mph) - the new locomotive (designation Fuxing), was ready for service. Several variants of the locomotive are now in operation, with the CR400BF accurately modelled here for you to enjoy.

The CR400BF with the striking golden/white livery was given the appropriate nickname ‘Golden Phoenix’. Take the controls of the Phoenix as you fly over viaducts and soar through valleys at breathtaking speeds. With 10 new scenarios on Southwest China High Speed, the 570 km route is the perfect place to enjoy all the features of this essential locomotive from Just Trains.

Included Scenarios


The China Railways CR400BF Loco Add-On includes 10 career scenarios for the South West China High Speed route:

  • G806 ChongQingNotrh - LanZhouWest
  • C8250 Chengdu East to Hechuan
  • C7717 Sunning to Hechuan
  • G218 Sui Ning to Xi'An Be
  • D4580 Hechuan to Suining
  • G396 ChengDuEast to ShangHaiHongQiao
  • G603 Nanchong to Yinchuan
  • G103 Urumqi to Chongqing North
  • D1865 Chengdu East to Beijingxi W
  • C3805 Hechuan to Chengdu East

More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!

Key Features


  • CR400BF in standard and BF-A configurations with ‘Golden Phoenix’ livery
  • Automatic drive Mode (FAO）
  • Next signal distance indicator
  • Next speed limit distance indicator
  • Automatic Train Protection (ATP)
  • Anti-Drowsiness Vigilance System (ADVS)
  • Cruise control mode
  • Gradient indicator
  • Passenger cabin view
  • Quick Drive compatible
  • Download size: 67.5MB

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator Classic User Guide.
